name.title: Plugin Name
name.description: This name will be displayed in the Homebridge log.

exposeOutdoorUnit.title: Expose Outdoor Unit
exposeOutdoorUnit.description: When enabled, the plugin will create a separate accessory for your outdoor unit which will display the (outdoor) temperature it measures. This can be used for monitoring and automation purposes.

startSwing.title: Start Swing
startSwing.description: Swing value with each state change made with Homekit (e.g. activation): do nothing, set on, set off.

startNanoe.title: Start Nanoe
startNanoe.description: Nanoe value with each state change made with Homekit (e.g. activation): do nothing, set on, set off.

startEcoNavi.title: Start Eco Navi
startEcoNavi.description: Eco Navi value with each state change made with Homekit (e.g. activation): do nothing, set on, set off.

startInsideCleaning.title: Start Inside Cleaning
startInsideCleaning.description: Inside Cleaning value with each state change made with Homekit (e.g. activation): do nothing, set on, set off.

oscilateSwitch.title: Oscilate Switch
oscilateSwitch.description: Decide what the switch should control: Swing Mode, Nanoe, Eco Navi or Inside Cleaning.

maxAttempts.title: Maximum number of failed login attempts

refreshInterval.title: Refresh interval (in minutes)
refreshInterval.description: Recomended: 10 minutes. Minimum 1 minute, Maximum 360 minutes (6 hours). Note: More frequent refresh would result in too much daily number of requests to the Panasonic server, which could result in an account lock for 24 hours, or even a complete API lock.

swingModeDirections.title: Swing Directions
swingModeDirections.description: This setting controls which swing direction(s) will be activated when 'Oscillate' is switched on.

swingModeDefaultPositionLeftRight.title: Swing Mode Default Position (Left-Right)
swingModeDefaultPositionLeftRight.description: The desired position of the Left-Right flaps when 'Oscillate' is switched off.

swingModeDefaultPositionUpDown.title: Swing Mode Default Position (Up-Down)
swingModeDefaultPositionUpDown.description: The desired position of the Up-Down flaps when 'Oscillate' is switched off.

debugMode.title: Debug Mode
debugMode.description: Enable to see debug messages in logs. For the function to work, it is also required to enable Debug in Homebridge Settings.

suppressOutgoingUpdates.title: Suppress outgoing device updates
suppressOutgoingUpdates.description: When enabled, changes in the Home app will not be sent to Comfort Cloud. Useful for testing your installation without constantly switching the state of your AC to minimise wear and tear.

appVersionOverride.title: Emulated Comfort Cloud app version (override)
appVersionOverride.description: Leave this field empty to automatically fetch the latest version from the App Store and if that fails, it will use the last known working value which is hard-coded. Filling in this field will make the entered version used (automatic overwriting of versions from the App Store will not work).

minHeatingTemperature.title: Minimum heating temperature (override)
minHeatingTemperature.description: The default heating temperature range is 16-30°C. Some Panasonic ACs have an additional heating mode for the range of 8-15°C. If you own such a model, you can use this setting to adjust the minimum value. Leave it empty or undefined to use the default value.

layout.title: Basic settings
layout.description: Enter your Panasonic Comfort Cloud login details. It is recommended to set up a separate account for Homebridge and share the devices from your main account.

layout.title: Swing Mode settings
layout.description: The Home app has only one 'Oscillate' switch, but most Panasonic ACs have two swing directions. These settings controls which swing direction(s) will be activated.
